Movies.Title: Inception
Movies.Description: A skilled thief is given a chance to erase his criminal history by performing an impossible task: planting an idea into someone's subconscious.

Movies.Title: The Godfather
Movies.Description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his empire to his reluctant son.

Movies.Title: Parasite
Movies.Description: A poor family, the Kims, con their way into becoming the servants of a rich family, but their easy life gets complicated when their deception is threatened with exposure.

Movies.Title: Interstellar
Movies.Description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

Movies.Title: Schindler's List
Movies.Description: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

Movies.Title: The Dark Knight
Movies.Description: When the menace known as the Joker emerges from his mysterious past, he wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham.

Movies.Title: Forrest Gump
Movies.Description: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal, and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75.

Movies.Title: The Shawshank Redemption
Movies.Description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.
